name: Verto Machina
description:
Make your way through 4 fun levels as you use your Mirroring Gun to switch pairs of objects in the world.  Play around with different mechanics like the Mirroring Gun, jump pads, moving platforms, lasers, and of course, mirrors!

Puzzle platforming game submitted for the Mirror Game Jam on 6/22/2017.

Follow my progress with this and other interesting projects by checking out My Youtube Channel!
